alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 9:41AM EST until February 23 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Onondaga, Madison, Cortland and Chenango counties in central New York. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening and morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation starts off as a period of snow, heavy at times this afternoon. The snow is then forecast to change over to sleet and freezing rain after 8 PM this evening. Periods of light freezing rain and sleet will change over to rain late tonight or Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Yates
